query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS push_records (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    app_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT,
    target_type VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'all',
    target_ids TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'pending',
    sent_count INT DEFAULT 0,
    success_count INT DEFAULT 0,
    failed_count INT DEFAULT 0,
    scheduled_at DATETIME,
    sent_at DATETIME,
    created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    deleted_at DATETIME,
    INDEX idx_push_records_app_id (app_id),
    INDEX idx_push_records_status (status),
    INDEX idx_push_records_app_status (app_id, status),
    INDEX idx_push_records_created_at (created_at)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HmF555sZ6wXsVo.885fbf394348 --database cSZcQBnZuHpLU79S85jppV --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS push_records (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    app_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT,
    target_type VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'all',
    target_ids TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'pending',
    sent_count INT DEFAULT 0,
    success_count INT DEFAULT 0,
    failed_count INT DEFAULT 0,
    scheduled_at DATETIME,
    sent_at DATETIME,
    created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    deleted_at DATETIME,
    INDEX idx_push_records_app_id (app_id),
    INDEX idx_push_records_status (status),
    INDEX idx_push_records_app_status (app_id, status),
    INDEX idx_push_records_created_at (created_at)
);
